import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, FormControlLabel, FormLabel, InputLabel, MenuItem, Radio, RadioGroup, Select, TextField } from '@mui/material' import { AdapterDayjs } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDayjs'; import { LocalizationProvider } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/LocalizationProvider'; import { DatePicker } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/DatePicker'; import { FormControl } from '@mui/base' import styles from './employeeForm.module.scss' const EmployeeForm = (props) => { const {cities, skills, handelSubmit} = props const [empData, setEmpData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", contact: "", city: "", dob: "", skill: "", gender: "" }) const handelOnChange = (key, value) => { setEmpData((prevValue) => ({...prevValue, [key]: value})); } return (
Name handelOnChange('fullName', e.target.value)} helperText="This field is required." />
Email handelOnChange('email', e.target.value)} />
Contact Number handelOnChange('contact', e.target.value)} />
Select City
D.O.B {/* handelOnChange('dob', e.$D)} /> */} handelOnChange('dob', e.target.value)} />
Select Skills
handelOnChange('gender', e.target.value)} > } label="Female" /> } label="Male" /> } label="Other" />
} // defaultChecked label="This is active user" value={empData.isActive} onChange={(value)=>handelOnChange('isActive', value.target.checked)} />
) } export default EmployeeForm
